comment: Replacing (or adding) the edges (between elements of the base set) of an extensible structure results in a hypergraph. Instead of requiring ` ( ph -> G Struct X ) ` , it would be sufficient to require ` ( ph -> Fun ( G \ { (/) } ) ) ` and ` ( ph -> G e. _V ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 18-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jun-2021.) (Revised by AV, 16-Nov-2021.)
